properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 13 at 4:19PM EST until January 14 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
waves 2 to 5 feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY
